TopicTitle: Old versions of KSP (some versions still wanted!)

Articles.Content:
this place deserves a b.u.m.p! (bumpy.uber.multi.post!)

(it's not like it was last posted on last yea- oh.)

anyway, nice old game versions! I never got a chance to play them, so this helps!

message redacted

Edited January 8, 2014 by SkyHook
It would be nice if this got stickied...

Great to still see this topic up!

It's really great to see the old versions and than look at the recently posted ambitions for 0.24. This game has gone so far.

Tried 0.7.3 for the giggles, I didn't even get out of the atmosphere (though I was lazy and only tried one, very simple, design). But 0.13.3 just finished and iirc it used to be a demo version = the first one I played.
I want .15.2 plz!
Those old versions really makes you apreciate what we play now IÃ‚Â´m on my way to MÃƒÂ¼n in 0.13.3. and I have a ton of fun

I want .15.2 plz!

Any version after 0.13.3 is a paid version and therefore cannot be shared.
Just played .7.3 and you really appreciate the simple things, like symmetry, and struts.
I have a copy of 0.15 now if i can share it.

I have a copy of 0.15 now if i can share it.

You cannot share any version of KSP above version 0.13.3

I think you are violating the EULA

you cant distribute unless you have a written consent i believe.

Indeed, that'd be a be a bad idea, Pockrtplanesairways

EDIT: But for real, don't share that.

From the EULA:

"You may not distribute registered copies of the SOFTWARE PRODUCT to third parties... You may not rent, lease, or lend the SOFTWARE PRODUCT... "

So yeah, that would be a Very Bad Thing.

Paid versions aside...

8.3 is the only version we don't have tracked down?!? We need to fix that, get the word out!
Darn it. I really wish i could spread the fun.

It would be great, but yes... you would be pirating paid for software.

Perhaps if there is enough interest Squad could be convinced to add a back catalogue to the user accounts. I'm not sure how it works on steam as I have a ksp website account, but I always have the option of downloading the current version or the previous one... would be nice to have a list of all previous versions!
Couldn't Anyone just download one of these and then have the game for free?
No, these versions represent very old states of the game and are very different from what KSP is today

No, these versions represent very old states of the game and are very different from what KSP is today

Doesn't matter. It's still pirating, unless you own it. Even then, it's a gray area, because you don't automatically have a license to every version ever created.

Doesn't matter. It's still pirating, unless you own it. Even then, it's a gray area, because you don't automatically have a license to every version ever created.

The versions of KSP up to 0.13.3 were free, and they can be shared as you wish. The same goes for 0.18.3 (the current demo). This is not piracy.
Maybe they should sticky this for people who want older versions of KSP

Doesn't matter. It's still pirating, unless you own it. Even then, it's a gray area, because you don't automatically have a license to every version ever created.

I hope you realise you're arguing with one of the forum administrators here.

Hehe.

I really must have a look at some of these when I'm not neck-deep in late assignments... hmmm.

Couldn't Anyone just download one of these and then have the game for free?
Anyone can just download the current demo, 0.18.3. Which, unlike the ancient versions in this thread, is pretty much the same as the current full game apart from having fewer parts and fewer planets.
Finally! Been looking for 0.7.3!
Oh good, I found this thread again. I just re-downloaded all of them
